::DrillBit::

DrillBit entered the pod, sitting down next to KitKat after he saw 
the base explode.

"Well, that's another base down. I wonder how many we'll go through."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> The transport pod was enough to hold 25 bots, 32 if they really 
> packed them inside it. She sat at the controls and fired up the 
> thrusters. "Everyone in yet?"
> 
> DarkMouse and GoldenEye walked in and sat down in the back section.
